column5: I just finished last years video (which includes a 52 inch musky) 1 day before we leave on this years trip back to lotw. check it out....http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dc35d...&feature=g-uplI'll be updating nightly @Lunkerbass21 on twitter all next week. We fish out of the Kenora.
Enjoyed your video......especially the opening with the luggage, planes, etc...nicely done ! Not to mention the great fishing and fun times. Looking forward to viewing your 2012 trip ! Rich B
Well done. Good material, captured all the fun of the trip and the fishing.
That was really well done... I liked the awards and how you wrapped it up. Thanks for posting it up for us!
WOW !! Someone has a future in VIDEO EDITING and sound! Great video, again, I might add. You Guys have a bunch of FUN, for sure.... I'll be there (near there, anyway) in mid-Sept. !! Can't wait! JIMI
Great quality. What camera did you use?
All the video was taken with Kodak Playsport cameras. Can't wait to get back up there tomorrow.bassface44 (husky jerk)
Thanks Bass, seems like a very nice camera at that price.

They are definitely pretty nice when they work for the money. I know LunkerB has had problems getting one to last. Battery/charging issues with 3 different units I think now. Mine has been fine though.
